p: Starch content was analyzed using a UV1601 UV-Vis spectrophotometer (Shimadzu, Japan) at a wavelength of 600 nm, with a soluble starch standard (chromatographic grade, CAS: 140602; CNIFDC, China). The analytical chemicals, apparatus, analytical conditions, standard preparation, starch extraction, and preparation of C. wenyujin rhizomes samples have previously been described in detail by Zhang et al. [ 54].
